parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables or disables firing from a vehicle cargo position. To get the turret path use [[assignedVehicleRole]] or [[getCargoIndex]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''enablePersonTurret''' [turretPath, enable]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [turretPath, enable]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>heli [[enablePersonTurret]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[1],[[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[assignedVehicleRole]], [[allTurrets]], [[moveInTurret]], [[turretUnit]], [[assignAsTurret]], [[getCargoIndex]], [[moveInCargo]], [[assignAsCargoIndex]], [[emptyPositions]]
</value></part></template></root>
